about_the_game:
Embark on an interstellar journey like no other in "Project Star," a thrilling looter shooter set in a captivating sci-fi universe. Prepare to dive into the heart of an expansive and treacherous cosmos, where the line between survival and fortune is as thin as a cosmic ray.

In this action-packed adventure, you'll forge your destiny as a fearless spacefaring hero, facing an array of formidable foes across alien worlds and derelict starships. Unleash a devastating arsenal of futuristic weaponry, each with its own unique abilities and modifications, as you scavenge, loot, and power-up your character.

With its richly detailed sci-fi landscapes, relentless action, and a loot system that keeps you constantly hungry for the next epic gear upgrade, "Project Star" is the ultimate fusion of the looter shooter genre with the vastness of space exploration. Get ready to experience the thrill where every star hides untold treasures, and every battle could be your last.

Key Features:

  • Explore within endless galaxies, fly to any space station and scrap its contents for parts
  • Engage in intense, fast-paced combat with a wide variety of weapons and abilities.
  • Customize and upgrade your character with a vast array of loot and gear.
  • Experience the thrill of exploration and the adrenaline rush of relentless action.

content_descriptors.notes: This game will display a lot of blood and other gore elements.

short_description: A fast paced looter shooter set in a scifi world. Purge, loot, upgrade and repeat.
